name: 尸毒来袭 - Zombie Virus Attack
name_original: 尸毒来袭 - Zombie Virus Attack
description:
If you are interested in this game, don't forget to add it to your wish list and join our discussion group. A playtest is in progress.
QQ group: 651050017

Backgrounds

It was a normal weekend afternoon when Ling was going to go shopping with her mother. However, they ran into the zombie virus outbreak before leaving the community. On the way back to the apartment, she witnessed the tragedy of her mother... After experiencing extreme fright and the fatigue of escaping, when Ling came back to her senses again, she was already in the living room of her home. The screams from outside became less and less, replaced by monster roars.

Ling made up her mind and picked up a baseball bat. And with her excellent athletic ability, she desperately rushed to the hospital where her father works. But as she continued to explore, she felt that this zombie virus epidemic was not an accident, and may have a deep connection with the hospital. What’s worse, her own condition was becoming increasingly worrying.

Even if she is lucky enough to survive, is she still herself?

Features

  • This is a fast-paced card strategy game with different challenges and dangers every time. The girl alone needs your help.

  • Not enough space in backpacks? Confused about which weapon or medicine to use? But the zombies won't give you too much time, fight back as soon as possible.

  • Multi-type mutated monsters keep coming and attacking you, so be prepared.

  • Every choice you make may affect the girl's status. Be sure to keep an eye on her physical condition.
